ohu mathaka hitinna iganwu ekama wachanaya laboratari kiyana eka ohu anthimata panthiyata aa da kalu lalle lokuwata sinhalen liyala giya, eeta pera dawase ohu apata hom wark ekak dilalu, kawuda danne api ek ek kenata pothath aran panthiya issarahata enna kiwwa, hom wark eka karala nathi poth panthiyata udin pa karala yawwa, ekama pothayi ithuruwune, ee ee gurage gedarata allapu gedara dariwige potha, eya hom wark eka karala thibbada danne na nathath ee dariwige thaththa ee gurawa wunath pa karala yawanna pasubata wena kenek nam neweyi.
